attributes.action: Disability Education Taught In Mainstream Schools
attributes.additional_details:
Disabilities are wide and varied affeting people differently.

Disabled people are often sterotyped and put into undeserving categories of uselessness.

I would like to see Disability Classes taught in mainstream schools as a lesson just like math and english.

By teaching understanding and acceptance to our future generations I beleive 'Disability' would become more normalised and accepted with less judgements.

We need to teach the future generations.
